chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.
items.plainText: Now concerning spiritual gifts, brethren, I would not have you ignorant.

items.text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.
items.plainText: Ye know that ye were Gentiles, carried away unto these dumb idols, even as ye were led.

items.text: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.
items.plainText: Wherefore I give you to understand, that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed: and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord, but by the Holy Ghost.

items.text: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.
items.plainText: Now there are diversities of gifts, but the same Spirit.

items.text: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.
items.plainText: And there are differences of administrations, but the same Lord.

items.text: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.
items.plainText: And there are diversities of operations, but it is the same God which worketh all in all.

items.text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.
items.plainText: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal.

items.text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;
items.plainText: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit;

items.text: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;
items.plainText: To another faith by the same Spirit; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit;

items.text: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:
items.plainText: To another the working of miracles; to another prophecy; to another discerning of spirits; to another divers kinds of tongues; to another the interpretation of tongues:

items.text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.
items.plainText: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit, dividing to every man severally as he will.

items.text: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.
items.plainText: For as the body is one, and hath many members, and all the members of that one body, being many, are one body: so also is Christ.

items.text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.
items.plainText: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body, whether we be Jews or Gentiles, whether we be bond or free; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit.

items.text: For the body is not one member, but many.
items.plainText: For the body is not one member, but many.

items.text: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
items.plainText: If the foot shall say, Because I am not the hand, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

items.text: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?
items.plainText: And if the ear shall say, Because I am not the eye, I am not of the body; is it therefore not of the body?

items.text: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?
items.plainText: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing, where were the smelling?

items.text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.
items.plainText: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body, as it hath pleased him.

items.text: And if they were all one member, where were the body?
items.plainText: And if they were all one member, where were the body?

items.text: But now are they many members, yet but one body.
items.plainText: But now are they many members, yet but one body.

items.text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.
items.plainText: And the eye cannot say unto the hand, I have no need of thee: nor again the head to the feet, I have no need of you.

items.text: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:
items.plainText: Nay, much more those members of the body, which seem to be more feeble, are necessary:

items.text: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
items.plainText: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.

items.text: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:
items.plainText: For our comely parts have no need: but God hath tempered the body together, having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked:

items.text: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.
items.plainText: That there should be no schism in the body; but that the members should have the same care one for another.

items.text: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
items.plainText: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.

items.text: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.
items.plainText: Now ye are the body of Christ, and members in particular.

items.text: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.
items.plainText: And God hath set some in the church, first apostles, secondarily prophets, thirdly teachers, after that miracles, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, diversities of tongues.

items.text: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?
items.plainText: Are all apostles? are all prophets? are all teachers? are all workers of miracles?

items.text: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?
items.plainText: Have all the gifts of healing? do all speak with tongues? do all interpret?

items.text: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
items.plainText: But covet earnestly the best gifts: and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way.
